alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 29 at 6:19AM AKST until January 29 at 10:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dense fog reducing visibility as low as one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog has developed primarily on the south side of town. While areas of fog are intermittent, some locations will see visibility reduced to one quarter mile or less at times. Fog will likely linger through the late morning hours before increasing winds work to diminish the fog.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
